page.title: 14I.W.C.C. TEACHER'S CENTRE
page.content: The Isle of Wight Teacher's Centre is housed in the ex-Newport Town Library (The Seely Library).The centre has a number of functions:- 1.To organise and run in-service courses for teachers. 2.To organise and run curriculum development groups. 3.To provide a loan sevice of teaching materials. 4.To publish teaching materials on topics of local interest. 5.To provide a number of services for teachers,such as a lending library of educational books,a computer soft-ware preview service,and reprographic equipment.The centre also incorporates a Health Education Resource Centre,A Schools/Industry Partnership,the T.V.E.I.Unit and the Island's Remedial Advisory Service. Policy of the Centre is made through a Steering Committee of teachers,advisers,officers,and Education Committee members.
